Shikamaru branches out his shadow, with the tip of each branch holding an explosive tag.

== Trivia ==
* This jutsu's name referred to the ryūō, the promoted rook in [[wikipedia:Shogi|shōgi]] (a common motif associated with Shikamaru), otherwise known as the dragon or dragon king.
